detaileddescription.para: LibSteel comes pre-installed with the examples in the examples/ folder of RISC-V Steel. LibSteel will be automatically built and linked for all the example applications.

We recommend starting a new project from one of the examples. By doing so, you don't have to worry about linking scripts and the complex options you need to set to get GCC cross-compiling for your embedded application.
To learn how to start a project from the examples see the Staring a new project guide.
